website_summaries.verdict: If you're a veteran drone racer, you'll love this model, which includes lots of options for customization.
pros: Well-designed drone that doesn't take much to get it to fly right out of the box
Size makes it easy to transport
cons: Steep learning curve may be too challenging for beginners

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quad for many skill levels!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quad!! I love mine and hands down wouldn't think twice buying one again. Immersion makes great products and this quad is a testimate to that reputation. Planning on many many many more flights with this quad in the future. I agree with another review the props how like a banshee but I kind of like it. I have 3 more brands props to try out as well but for now it stays just how it was out of the box and flies like a dream. Setup was unbelievably easy. Booted, went through the menus with my transmitter and was ready to go in 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Washam

customer_reviews.title: My 11 year old and I have been racing low quality drones for a couple years now and this is the best little turn key drone i have bought yet
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. My 11 year old and I have been racing low quality drones for a couple years now and this is the best little turn key drone i have bought yet. Setup was easy and the smaller FRSky receiver fits inside the frame which is excellent. the necessary sbus cable is also included. i have tried 4052 props and they seem to draw less amps than the included two blades.
customer_reviews.author: Jay C.

customer_reviews.title: The best for  beginners, no computer needed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quad copter super easy to set up for anybody it is docile for beginners but it can be very aggressive for experience Pilots. Is small which makes it convenience for transportation but Packs the punch of the big quads on it. The On Screen Displays is very well place and it is ease to see your telemetry info, and keep a watch on your battery voltage.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel and Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little quad!!! You can Race, Cruise or Freestyle
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Vortex and it’s my favorite! The original Vortex 285 was my first quad and I also love the Vortex 250 Ummagawd edition. The Vortex 180, with the optional camera mount, carries my Runcam hd2 with no problem. The 3s 850mah 90c Infinity graphene battery works great and 4s batteries would make this quad ridiculously fast🙂
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: This is so much fun to fly it's almost ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun to fly it's almost ridiculous. I wasn't going to get these because of the price. My family gifted me and I'm ready to buy another. These folks at ImmersionRC know what going on. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cyril A.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Racing Drone
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice racing drone. I added a $26 DMX receiver and $17 battery and bound it with my DX6i transmitter and it was ready to fly.
customer_reviews.author: R. Robinette

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Race/Freestyle/Basher Drone
customer_reviews.text: This thing flies great right out of the box! 3 flight modes make it great for beginners & experts. It's fast & snappy but slow and stable at the same time. Price is a little high, but worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Daren Manson

customer_reviews.title: This little drone is very tough and very powerful
customer_reviews.text: This is simply the best 180 cm quad that you can buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy with the drone
customer_reviews.text: Minor annoyance. I have 20:20 vision but the I still couldn't read the tiny print in the manual! At this price point I expect better.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great product I wuld buy agin
customer_reviews.text: Great drone I bought some 4s 850mah lipos to go with it and it flys amazing fast and agile right out of the box. Osd is a big plus let’s you see you batt voltage and mah in real time and also has multiple osd options. It’s not needed to fly but I recommend configuring failsafe and buzzer on bataflight.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Vortex 180 Mini by ImmersionRC
customer_reviews.text: Amazing piece of a drone. Beautifully built and designed. Nice escape from Chinese projects - finally not need to improve the factory work :) Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Darius R.

customer_reviews.title: Vortex 180
customer_reviews.text: This quad was exactly what I was hoping for, everything was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Gatewood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 180 race drone!
customer_reviews.text: This I'd a very fast, high quality, race drone. You will love it! One of the best in its class!
customer_reviews.author: Matt M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quad, very durable!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for $200... very durable too! Highly recommend for any skill level with the 3 different flight modes.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Elsner

customer_reviews.title: Maybe as a starter...but so small!
customer_reviews.text: Very mini ...unstable when any wind. Newer models with live picture are more satisfying
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best drone deal I have found so far
customer_reviews.text: Was a little hesitant at first but when the day came the box was perfect ZERO shipping damage plugged right into betaflight and setup was done in 5 mins with my taranis only thing u will need is some new props the bi blade that come with it are pretty flexible and howl wile flying but for the price I would definitely recommend to any beginners as well as pros
customer_reviews.author: John frank

customer_reviews.title: Completely wrong
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box. The manual for it isn’t the right one. It is for the 150 model. The props are not the correct ones either. They do not fit.
customer_reviews.author: nicksontz

customer_reviews.title: The worst drone ever
customer_reviews.text: The worst drone ever!!! No take off even with the second drone I got from them!!! Did the whole switch bottom to the right, your buying a headache that does not work.......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best $40 I've ever spent!
customer_reviews.text: Got this quad on sale before Christmas for $40! Best money I've spent on quads in a long time. Yes it is probably 2 years old but you know what? It's still very fun to fly! I've only ever had 5" quads and tiny whoops, this is my first go at a 4". I like it. The setup is super easy and the built in OSD is very nice. Plus you can do everything with your radio, you don't even need a computer to make any changes.
customer_reviews.author: fluffy

product_meta.title: ImmersionRC Airplanes RC Vortex 180 Mini Arf Quadcopter Racing Drone, White, 180mm
product_meta.description: Immersion RC vortex 180 mini racing drone is a turbocharged Quadcopter that's ready for competition. As a ready-to-fly race drone, it's simple to take the vortex 180 out of the box, bind to a receiver be competing within minutes.
feature_bullets: Almost ready to fly straight out of the box
3rd Gen 16A EZESC'S, With OneShot125/42 support, and DShot-600
Direct connection to PPM, Spectrum, S-Bus, XBUS receivers

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars33 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
